content: meila cowl valerie hobbs this light lacy cowl is the perfect piece for early spring with its uncomplicated lace pattern and its soothing intervals of stockinette and garter stitch this is a good project for both the beginner and experienced knitter finished measurements 22¼ circumference x 16 high yarn 350 yds sportweight or heavy fingering weight wool or wool blend shown in crave yarn caravan 70% sw fine merino 10% camel 10% cashmere 10% mulberry silk 354 yds /100 g - nuance needles u s size 6 4mm 16 circular needle adjust needle size as needed to obtain correct gauge other stitch marker tapestry needle gauge 23 sts = 4 in stockinette skill level advanced beginner techniques include long tail cast on knitting in the round decreases and yarnovers _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ copyright ©2021valerie hobbs laughingstar knits for personal use only meila cowl page 1 abbreviations bobble bind off co cast on k knit k2tog knit 2 sts together repeat repeat round s round s s2kp slip 2 sts together ssk slip 2 sts knitwise one yo yarnover knitwise k1 pass at a time knit slipped sts over together through the back loops directions using long tail method co 128 stitches place marker for beginning of round and join for working in round being careful not to twist sts note circumference of cowl may be adjusted by casting on a smaller or larger amount of sts but st count must be multiple of 16 round 1 purl round 36 repeat round 32 round 2 knit rnds 37-40 knit round 3 purl rnds 4 and 5 knit rnds 41-55 repeat rnds 1-15 round 6 *k3 ssk yo k1 yo k2tog repeat from * to end of round rnds 56-59 knit round 7 knit round 60 *k11 ssk yo k1 yo k2tog repeat from round 8 *k4 yo s2kp yo k1 repeat from * to * to end of round end of round round 61 knit round 9 knit round 62 *k12 yo s2kp yo k1 repeat from * to round 10 repeat round 6 end of round rnds 11 and 12 knit round 63 knit round 13 purl round 64 repeat round 60 round 14 knit round 65 knit round 15 purl round 66 *k7 ssk yo k1 yo k2tog k4 repeat from * to end of round rnds 16-19 knit round 67 knit round 20 *k3 ssk yo k1 yo k2tog k8 repeat round 68 *k8 yo s2kp yo k5 repeat from * to from * to end of round end of round round 21 knit round 69 knit round 22 *k4 yo s2kp yo k9 repeat from * to round 70
